thread.title: Caps captain Ovechkin misses morning skate for personal reasons; game-time decision vs Sharks
thread.title_full: Caps captain Ovechkin misses morning skate for personal reasons; game-time decision vs Sharks

title: Caps captain Ovechkin misses morning skate for personal reasons; game-time decision vs Sharks
text:
Caps captain Ovechkin misses morning skate for personal reasons; game-time decision vs Sharks THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   12:37 pmLast   12:37 pm   
People: 
WASHINGTON — Capitals coach Barry Trotz says captain Alex Ovechkin will be a game-time decision against the San Jose Sharks . 
Ovechkin missed Washington's morning skate ahead of Tuesday night's game for personal reasons. 
No other details were given. 
Ovechkin is a three-time NHL MVP who led the league with 53 goals last season. 
He had a goal and an assist in Washington's season-opening 5-3 victory over New Jersey on Saturday.
